0: Ahh... The sweet taste of victory
1: Go head and breathe it in like antihistamine
2: I know they sayin' "Damn, Ye snapped with this beat!"
3: Fuck you expect? I've got a history

5: Haters back down, gotta be that steel!
6: I know they can't wait till ya outta ya deal!

12: And you be up so high

16: So I could vacate where it ain't no channels

title: They Say
